title: Dark Sunglasses

verbs: To gauge, estimate or judge by eye; to look or glance at.
nouns: Clothing that is worn or carried, but not part of your main clothing.
An article of clothing or equipment, in particular when used as an accessory.
Clothing that is worn or carried, but not part of your main clothing
Spectacles that are darkened or polarized to protect the eyes from the glare of the sun
Sunglasses or sun glasses are a form of protective eyewear designed primarily to prevent bright sunlight and high-energy visible light from damaging or discomforting the eyes.
Tinted glasses worn to protect the eyes from the sun.
Often referred to as shades, eye protection wear
Special glasses that protect the eyes from strong sunlight and uv rays.
An organ of vision that detects light
An eye.
The organ of sight
Organ that detects light and converts it into electro-chemical impulses in neurons
The two eyes of a human being considered as a whole.
A window or other opening that has an oval or circular shape (as of an eye).
An organ through which animals see.
Eyes are sensory organs of the face responsible for sight.
An oculus, plural oculi, from Latin oculus: eye, denotes a circular opening in the center of a dome or in a wall.
Eyes are the organs of vision.
The part of the eye having a spherical shape.
The organ that is sensitive to light, which it converts to electrical signals passed to the brain, by which means animals see.
Eyewear consists of items and accessories worn on or over the eyes, for fashion or adornment, protection against the environment, and to improve or enhance visual acuity.

description:
Sunglasses that can be worn outside for protection from the sun. Often association with connotations of being "cool", or leisurely in sunny places.

This emoji shows only the sunglasses, which differs from the smiling face with sunglasses emoji.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the sunglasses emoji presents a cool, stylish pair of dark lenses with a reflective sheen, framed by a sleek, modern design. The glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give these shades a distinctively premium and sophisticated look. This emoji on Apple devices perfectly conveys a sense of coolness, confidence, or protection from the sun, making it a versatile addition to express a relaxed or carefree mood.
